mapper.select: select * from yb_rental_info where yri_redate is null
mapper.insert: insert into yb_rental_info (yri_idx , yri_rtdate, ybi_idx, yu_userid ) values( (select nvl(max(yri_idx), 0) + 1 from yb_rental_info), sysdate, #{ybi_idx}, #{yu_userid})
mapper.update: UPDATE yb_rental_info SET YRI_REDATE = sysdate WHERE YU_USERID = #{yu_userid} AND YBI_IDX = #{ybi_idx} AND YRI_REDATE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(yri_rtdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS yri_rtdate, TO_CHAR(yri_redate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS yri_redate, CASE WHEN (to_date(TO_char(yri_redate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(TO_char(yri_rtdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24 * 60 >= 10080 THEN '기간만료' ELSE '반납완료' END AS comm, ybi_idx FROM yb_rental_info
